snippet: An Army staff sergeant accused of massacring Afghan civilians must undergo an official sanity review before a mental health defense can be presented.
abstract: Military judge Col Jeffery Nance orders Staff Sgt Robert Bales, man accused of massacring Afghan civilians, to undergo an official sanity review before presenting mental health defense.
lead_paragraph: An Army staff sergeant accused of massacring Afghan civilians must undergo an official sanity review before a mental health defense can be presented.

headline.seo: Washington: Sanity Review Ordered in Massacre Trial
